assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Sinpas Holding is a symbol of reputation and reliability in the real estate sector with 45 years of experience. Today, all activities involving Sinpas REIT show traces of the long-established past owned by Sinpas Holding. Sinpas REIT, which is traded in Borsa Istanbul, has been creating value for its shareholders and business partners since day one with its stable success chart. Continuing to grow with its strong financial structure and sustainable success strategies, the company's asset size has reached 5,379.854.713-TL by 30.06.2020. With its team of experts in urbanism, Sinpas REIT is focused on investments that create added value. With this approach, it evaluates the living conditions in the regions it invests in and carries out strategies to improve these conditions. Thus, vital quality and quality are increased not only in the housing projects it develops, but also in the circles where the projects are located. Sinpas REIT's activities throughout Turkey lay the foundation for a modern and safe lifestyle. The projects it implements are examples for other companies in the housing sector. Sinpas REIT, which made a difference with the 45 years of sinpas holding's 45-year accumulation in the original projects it developed, will be among the important players of the sector in 2020. The company will continue to develop projects from land acquisition, from residential design to production, sales to marketing, and by increasing its performance in all areas in which it operates.
